short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app which notifies you when there are new advertisements available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AdAlert is NeoBux's unique and exclusive Chrome App. It takes almost no space at all and you can configure it's size and if it stays always on top or not. It will notify you of new advertisements so that you'll never miss one. Available Mini Jobs will also be displayed.

You'll also have your updated balance(s) at the distance of a single click without disturbing you from what you're doing in your computer.

The App will be automatically updated (depending on your browser's settings) so that you'll always have the latest version.

NOTE: This App is a companion for the extension which means that it will not work without it.
